generated_body: If the user clicks on the article titled "31 Dumb Things That Are Keeping You From Becoming Wealthy," they are likely expecting a detailed analysis of common pitfalls that hinder financial success. It could also provide practical advice on how to overcome these obstacles, potentially featuring examples or anecdotes to illustrate each point. Overall, the user can anticipate a straightforward exploration of financial barriers, with an emphasis on self-improvement and actionable insights.
